output: Wild horses gallop across an expansive open plain under the golden rays of sunset, their manes billowing in dynamic waves as hooves kick up clouds of dust. Shadows lengthen on uneven terrain, accentuating the freedom and untamed spirit embodied by each creature, with distant mountains providing a dramatic backdrop evoking profound sense of boundless expanse.
